author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Shilpi Cable Technologies' board meeting adjourned
description: In view of that Board has decided to adjourn the meeting to next day i.e. Sunday, 05th November, 2017, inter-alia, to consider, approve and take on record the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2017.
articleBody: Shilpi cable technologies Limited informed the exchanges that directors presented at the meeting (held today) suggested some changes in the financial results which are necessary to be incorporated in the results. Our finance team needs time to amend the suggested changes. In view of that Board has decided to adjourn the meeting to next day i.e. Sunday, 05th November, 2017, inter-alia, to consider, approve and take on record the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2017.  Further, in terms of the Company' Code of Conduct for Trading by Insiders, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company will continue to remain closed for all directors, officers, designated employees and connected persons of the Company till end of 48 hours after the results are made public on 05th November, 2017Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Shilpi Cable Technologies: Outcome of board meeting
description: Shilpi Cable Technologies Limited informed the Exchanges that Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. 05th November, 2017, has considered and approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated financial results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March, 2017 in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
articleBody: Shilpi Cable Technologies Limited informed the Exchanges that Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. 05th November, 2017, has inter-alia considered and approved the following:  1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated financial results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March, 2017 in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. A copy of the same along with the Audit Reports (Standalone &amp; Consolidated) given by Statutory Auditor is attached herewith.  2. Fixing of day, date &amp; Place of 11th Annual General Meeting of the Company i.e. Thursday, 30th November, 2017 at Mapple Emerald, Rajokri, National Highway-8, New Delhi-110038.  The adjourned Board meeting started at 06.00 p.m. and concluded at 10.30 p.m.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'Rakesh Patil'}
headline: Exit Shilpi Cable Technologies, says Prakash Gaba
description: Prakash Gaba of prakashgaba.com is of the view that one may exit Shilpi Cable Technologies.
articleBody: Prakash Gaba of prakashgaba.com told CNBC-TV18, &quot;Shilpi Cable Technologies has a circuit on the way down. You cannot exit even if you want to. I would exit at the first opportunity and stay out.&quot;  At 14:26 hrs Shilpi Cable Technologies was quoting at Rs 23.30, down Rs 1.20, or 4.90 percent.  It has touched a 52-week low of Rs 23.30 on the BSE.
tags: Prakash Gaba of prakashgaba.com, Shilpi Cable Technologies, Stocks Views

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shilpi Cable Tech Q1 net up 13% at Rs 62.43 crore
description: Cable manufacturer Shilpi Cable Technologies (SCTL) today reported a 13 per cent increase in net profit to Rs 62.43 crore for the quarter ended June 30 2016.
articleBody: Cable manufacturer Shilpi Cable Technologies (SCTL) on Friday&amp;nbsp;reported a 13 per cent increase in net profit to Rs 62.43 crore for the quarter ended June 30 2016. The net profit for the company in the corresponding period of the previous fiscal stood at Rs 55.49 crore. Total revenues for the April-June period grew by 12 per cent to Rs 1,128.01 crore from Rs 1,010.88 crore in the same quarter last fiscal. &quot;We are beginning the financial year on a successful note with 12 per cent growth in revenues. All segments have performed well during this quarter. Our focus on consistently increasing our network and new product development using advance research and development techniques have augmented well with our vision to become a billion dollar company by 2020,&quot; company's Managing Director Manish Goel said in a statement. He said that in B2C segment, its brand 'SAFE' has evoked good response with its presences in 17 states in the country and the company will continue to launch more brands in order to penetrate the B2C segment in coming quarters. &quot;Demand for our products have increased in both domestic and international markets and we shall continue to tap new geographies going forward,&quot; Goel added. SCTL is engaged in manufacturing of wide variety of cables used in telecom, automotive and energy segments complied with the business of wires, switches, MCB, among others in B2C segment.
tags: PTI, Q1, Results, Shilpi Cable Technologies

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Shilpi Cable to invest &amp;#36;150 mn to set up plant in UAE
description: Shilpi Cable Technologies said it will invest USD 150 million (Rs 1,010 crore) for setting up of a plant for manufacturing copper products in Abu Dhabi, UAE
articleBody: Shilpi Cable Technologies said it will invest USD 150 million (Rs 1,010 crore) for setting up of a plant for manufacturing copper products in Abu Dhabi, UAE. In a BSE filing, the company said its board has approved &quot;setting up of project at Abu Dhabi, UAE through its subsidiary, having capacity of 60,000 MT for manufacturing of copper products with an investment of USD 150 million&quot;. It added that it will invest USD 50 million through equity and the balance USD 100 million will be through debt. The board also approved acquisition of 100 percent share of Shilpi Worldwide PTE Ltd, Singapore which is presently a step down wholly owned subsidiary of the company. &quot;The company shall buy 100 percent of the shares of Shilpi Worldwide PTE Ltd, Singapore from the company's direct wholly owned subsidiary -Shilpi Worldwide DMCC at the value of USD 5,303,947,&quot; it added. After this transaction, Shilpi Worldwide PTE Ltd, Singapore shall be a direct wholly owned subsidiary of the company instead of step down wholly owned subsidiary. The proposed transaction is subject to the requisite statutory approvals.
tags: Business, manufacturing copper products, Shilpi Cable Technologies

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'Faizan Javed'}
headline: Shilpi Cable Q2 profit shrinks 33% to Rs 27 cr
description: The company recently entered into a 50:50 JV with the New Zealand-based Eyecom Telecommunications Equipments, marking its foray in the next generation technology of radio frequency (RF).
articleBody: Cable manufacturer Shilpi Cable Technologies (SCTL) today reported a 33.39 percent decline in consolidated net profit at Rs 26.74 crore for the quarter ended September. Its net profit for the same quarter of the last fiscal stood at Rs 40.15 crore. Its consolidated total revenues for July-September jumped 10.27 percent to Rs 822.35 crore as against Rs 745.77 crore a year earlier. &quot;We have made a significant progress in the domestic business across business verticals and hence, on a stand-alone basis, our total revenues have jumped by 33.2 percent to Rs 416.02 crore during the quarter,&quot; MD Manish Goel told PTI. However, the overseas business took a knock in the copper wire conductor segment, which contributes nearly 70 percent of international revenues. &quot;As a result, on the consolidated basis, revenues grew only 10.27 percent, which reflected on the profits. We want to reduce our dependence on the copper wire business in the international market and expand our telecom and other businesses there simultaneously,&quot; he said. The company recently entered into a 50:50 JV with the New Zealand-based Eyecom Telecommunications Equipments, marking its foray in the next generation technology of radio frequency (RF). &quot;We have seen an increase in investments in the telecom sector. With this strategic partnership, we aim to capture at least 30 percent market share in the RF path solution market over the next three years. We also expect profits to increase significantly after the tie-up,&quot; Goel said. Shilpi Cables also has plans to seal more JVs in the next few years. &quot;We are planning to introduce new products in our basket for B2C segment. Also, we plan to invest Rs 50 crore in expansion of our production capacity. We will also invest Rs 5-10 crore in the next generation technology of radio frequency (RF),&quot; he added. Shilpi Cable Technologies' 23 percent revenue comes from the telecom segment, 21 percent from automotive, 10 percent from the consumer durables/assemblies, 12 percent from energy cables, and the rest 34 percent from copper wire conductor business.
tags: consolidated net profit, Manish Goel, Results, Shilpi Cable Technologies

headline: Shilpi Cable Technologies enters into JV with Eyecom Telecommunications Equipments
description: Shilpi Cable Technologies has entered into a joint venture with the Eyecom Telecommunications Equipments, headquartered in New Zealand, one of leading RF path technology solution providers globally, to introduce Base Station Antenna (BSA) products for 2G/3G/4G for marking its foray in the next generation technology of Radio Frequency (RF).
articleBody: Shilpi Cable Technologies Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has entered into a joint venture with the Eyecom Telecommunications Equipments Ltd, headquartered in New Zealand, one of leading RF path technology solution providers globally, to introduce Base Station Antenna (BSA) products for 2G/3G/4G for marking its foray in the next generation technology of Radio Frequency (RF).Source : BSE Read all announcements in Shilpi Cable
